channels.title: Blue Light
channels.description: Premier UK true crime channel featuring full-length documentary episodes covering British criminal cases, police investigations, and forensic analysis.

channels.title: Disgruntled Danny
channels.description: Independent satirical news commentary channel delivering sharp political analysis with dry British humour and irreverent perspectives on mainstream media.

channels.title: GB News
channels.description: Britain's alternative news channel offering diverse perspectives on UK politics, current affairs, and social issues with multiple presenters and in-depth analysis.

channels.title: Talk TV
channels.description: British news and opinion channel featuring Piers Morgan and prominent broadcasters delivering provocative debate, celebrity interviews, and uncompromising commentary.

channels.title: Dan Wootton Outspoken
channels.description: Investigative journalism and panel discussions tackling controversial UK news stories with guest contributors offering diverse perspectives on politics and culture.

channels.title: Absolute Crime
channels.description: Premium true crime podcast channel featuring gripping investigations into notorious criminal cases with high-quality documentary-style content and expert analysis.

channels.title: Spitting Image
channels.description: Legendary British satirical puppet show lampooning politicians, celebrities, and public figures with savage wit and hyper-realistic caricatures.

channels.description: Professional PHP and Laravel development channel featuring live coding sessions, tutorials, API design, and real-world software engineering best practices.

channels.title: Rude Guy
channels.description: Adult comedy channel featuring hilarious redubbed voiceovers of classic children's cartoons with crude humour and absurdist interpretations.

channels.title: ThePrimeagen
channels.description: Senior Netflix engineer sharing vim mastery, algorithmic problem-solving, systems programming, and software engineering philosophy with energetic teaching style.

channels.title: Fireship
channels.description: High-energy tech channel delivering rapid-fire tutorials, web development trends, and coding concepts in under 100 seconds with exceptional production quality.

channels.description: Clear, practical web development tutorials covering JavaScript, React, CSS, and modern frameworks with beginner-friendly explanations and real-world examples.

channels.description: Comprehensive web development tutorials covering full-stack JavaScript, Python, PHP, and modern frameworks with project-based learning approach.

channels.description: Python programming tutorials, machine learning, game development, and software engineering projects with clear explanations for intermediate developers.

channels.description: Advanced Python programming, software design patterns, clean code principles, and architectural best practices for professional developers.

channels.description: Rust programming philosophy, systems thinking, and software engineering wisdom delivered through polished, script-driven presentations.

channels.title: Bailey Sarian
channels.description: Murder mystery makeup - unique blend of true crime storytelling and makeup tutorials covering historical and contemporary criminal cases with dark humour.

channels.title: That Chapter
channels.description: Detailed true crime case investigations presented with dry wit and Irish charm, covering lesser-known cases with thorough research and engaging narration.

channels.title: JCS - Criminal Psychology
channels.description: Deep-dive interrogation analysis examining body language, psychological tactics, and criminal behaviour through actual police interview footage.

channels.title: Coffeehouse Crime
channels.description: Cosy true crime storytelling covering international cases with compassionate victim focus and theatrical presentation style over a cup of coffee.

channels.title: MrBallen
channels.description: Master storyteller presenting strange, dark, and mysterious true stories with cinematic flair, covering true crime, paranormal, and unexplained phenomena.

channels.title: Criminally Listed
channels.description: Concise true crime documentaries covering unsolved mysteries, serial killers, and criminal investigations with Australian perspective and thorough research.

channels.title: The Behavior Panel
channels.description: Expert body language analysis panel dissecting high-profile cases, interviews, and interrogations with four professional behaviour analysts.

channels.title: EWU Crime Storytime
channels.description: In-depth true crime documentaries with interrogation footage analysis, featuring detailed case breakdowns and criminal psychology insights.

channels.title: RedTree Crime
channels.description: Australian true crime channel covering local and international cases with respectful victim-focused storytelling and comprehensive case research.

channels.title: True Crime Recaps
channels.description: Detailed documentary-style recaps of notorious criminal cases with timeline breakdowns, court proceedings, and investigation developments.

channels.title: Bill Burr
